title: Configure orchestration settings
content:
Network topology is the arrangement of the various elements (links, nodes, etc.) in a network. Configure workers and RASes, which are part of the topology.  

Perform the following steps as the tenant admin or another user with the required permissions:

  1. In the Service Management agent interface, navigate to Administration > Configuration > Orchestration Settings. 
  2. The OO Central's Topology page opens. 
  3. Set up the topology for workers and RASes. For details, see Set up topology for workers and RASes.
